TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Lohok, title = Lohok, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lohok} }

S.FORM: alang Lohok ga niya mki sku Karing Keng atu Buri go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 289 buwan, 791 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 63% kyan ku 499 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 37% kyan ku 292 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Amis 59%, Bunun 1%, Truku 1%, binah lihuyan s'uli 2%. maki qu ngasal bziran, ngasal psatu tegami ru pqniqan iyu. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Lohok hya' ga rgyax. tay 'zil na Lohok hya' ga llyung. tay mkyahu' na Lohok hya' ga llyung. tay mkraya' na Lohok hya' ga llyung. tay mkraya' na Lohok hya' ga Matadim. tay mkyahu' na Lohok hya' ga Mangcelan. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 2 kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan qalang Lohok ga ungat pqwasan biru. tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Lohok ga niya mki sko Karing Keng ato Bori go, kwara sali bowan nya ga 289 bowan, 791 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 63% kyan ko 499 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 37% kyan ko 292 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Amis 59%, Bonon 1%, Troko 1%, binah lihoyan s'oli 2%. maki qo ngasal bziran, ngasal psato tegami ro pqniqan iyo. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Lohok hya' ga rgyax. tay 'zil na Lohok hya' ga llyong. tay mkyaho' na Lohok hya' ga llyong. tay mkraya' na Lohok hya' ga llyong. tay mkraya' na Lohok hya' ga Matadim. tay mkyaho' na Lohok hya' ga Mangcelan. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 2 kyokay. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan qalang Lohok ga ongat pqwasan biro. toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
